thread.title: Man Utd transfer news: Antoine Griezmann or Sergio Aguero suggests Paul Scholes | Metro News
thread.title_full: Man Utd transfer news: Antoine Griezmann or Sergio Aguero suggests Paul Scholes | Metro News

author: Tom Olver For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Man Utd transfer news: Antoine Griezmann or Sergio Aguero suggests Paul Scholes | Metro News
text:
Tom Olver for Metro.co.uk Thursday 16 Feb 2017 9:45 am Paul Scholes wants Antoine Griezmann or Sergio Aguero at Old Trafford (Picture: Getty) ‘How can Gibbs be captain?!’ Man Utd legend Roy Keane TEARS into Arsenal flops 
Atletico Madrid forward Griezmann has been heavily linked with a move to Old Trafford but will reportedly reject the Red Devils if they fail to qualify for next season’s Champions League. 
Sergio Aguero, meanwhile, is understood to be frustrated with a lack of game-time under Pep Guardiola at Manchester City which could see the Argentinian striker move on from the Etihad at the end of the campaign. 
Scholes, who scored 155 goals in 718 appearances for United from 1993 to 2013, believes either forward would make his former side a force once again. Paul Scholes hopes Man United have a big summer (Picture: Getty) ‘They’re only a couple of players away. I would bring in a controlling midfield player,’ he told the Daily Mail. ‘A centre forward to help [Zlatan] Ibrahimovic. Griezmann – or Aguero wouldn’t be bad!
